mapper.insert: insert into invite_authority_code (invite_code,used, invite_person_num, telephone, batch_num, create_time) values (#{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{used,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invitePersonNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update invite_authority_code set used = #{used,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_person_num = #{invitePersonNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch_num = #{batchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where invite_code = #{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select invite_code, used, invite_person_num, telephone, batch_num, create_time from invite_authority_code
